content: वाह {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [वह्-घञ्] Bearing, carrying &c. (at the end of <ab>comp.</ab>); as in अंबुवाह, तोयवाह &c. --हः {@--1@} Carrying, bearing. {@--2@} A porter. {@--3@} A draught-animal, a beast of burden. {@--4@} A horse; <ls>R. 4. 56</ls>, <ls n="R.">5. 73</ls>, <ls n="R.">14. 52.</ls> {@--5@} A bull; <ls>Ku. 7. 49.</ls> {@--6@} A buffalo. {@--7@} A carriage, conveyance in general. {@--8@} The arm. {@--9@} Air, wind. {@--10@} A measure equal to ten Kumbhas or four Bhāras; वाहो भारचतुष्टयं.
